mapper.select: SELECT wi.work_id, wi.pro_id, work_num, line_name, pro_num, pro_name, wi.work_state, oo_cnt, wi.reg_date, wi.work_cnt, oo_num, oo_end_date, emp.emp_name FROM work_instr wi LEFT JOIN out_order oo ON wi.oo_id = oo.oo_id LEFT JOIN client clt ON oo.clt_id = clt.clt_id LEFT JOIN line l ON wi.line_id = l.line_id LEFT JOIN product pro ON wi.pro_id = pro.pro_id LEFT JOIN employee emp ON wi.emp_id = emp.emp_id

SELECT wi.work_id, wi.pro_id, work_num, oo_num, pro_num, pro_name, oo_cnt, pro_unit, oo_end_date, clt_name, line_num, wi.reg_date FROM work_instr wi LEFT JOIN out_order oo ON wi.oo_id = oo.oo_id LEFT JOIN client clt ON oo.clt_id = clt.clt_id LEFT JOIN line l ON wi.line_id = l.line_id LEFT JOIN product pro ON wi.pro_id = pro.pro_id WHERE wi.work_id = #{work_id}

SELECT wi.work_id, wi.pro_id, ma_num, ma_name, req_cnt, work_cnt FROM work_instr wi LEFT JOIN requirement req ON wi.pro_id = req.pro_id LEFT JOIN material ma ON ma.ma_id = req.ma_id WHERE wi.work_id = #{work_id} AND wi.pro_id = #{pro_id}
SELECT wi.work_id, oo_num FROM work_instr wi RIGHT JOIN out_order oo ON wi.oo_id = oo.oo_id WHERE wi.work_id IS NULL

SELECT oo.pro_id, oo.oo_id, oo.clt_id, req.req_id, pro_num, pro_name, pro_unit, ma_num, ma_name, clt_name, req_cnt, oo_cnt, oo_end_date FROM work_instr wi RIGHT JOIN out_order oo ON wi.pro_id = oo.pro_id RIGHT JOIN requirement req ON oo.pro_id = req.pro_id RIGHT JOIN material ma ON req.ma_id = ma.ma_id RIGHT JOIN product pro ON req.pro_id = pro.pro_id RIGHT JOIN client clt ON oo.clt_id = clt.clt_id WHERE oo_num = #{oo_num}
SELECT concat('WI', lpad(work_id + 1, 4, 0)) AS work_num FROM work_instr ORDER BY work_id DESC LIMIT 1
